name: u5_mr
source: Using the weighted average from EA, which they get from GBD from county-specific estimates.

name: births_per_year
parameter: Children born per dispenser per year
notes: Weighted average of U5s per dispenser over all years, divide by 5 to back out the number of children born per dispenser per year.

name: takeup
parameter: Increase in use from dispenser access
source: 3, conversations with EA about their recent surveys on take up
notes: Dispenser take up adjusted based on recent EA survey data - (40% lower than previously thought)

name: life_years_per_death
parameter: Life years lost to child death
